TopicTitle: Add the "Lazor Warhead" explosiveness to other weapons, like pirated weaponry

Articles.Content:
So, as you may know, the lazor weapons have a destruction radius, and a blast radius, that are all controlled by some file in the Lazor System mod. The destruction radius instakills everything withing the radius, and anything inside the blast radius, gets a shockwave effect.

So, I looked at them, and decided to add the explosiveness to the "Bass Cannon Round" that is found in the Pirated Weaponry pack mod.

I added these lines at the end of the part .txt for 20cmRound (for the bass cannon)

MODULE

{

name = LazorWarhead

blastRadius = 90

destructionRadius = 0

}

So that it will not delete any parts it hits automatically, but in stead has some sort of shock wave. I've also reduced the decoupler ejection force, so that it actually hits another vessel instead of going through it, but for some reason it doesn't work, it hits the part, but doesn't even make it move, just a pretty explosion. Any ideas of what I might have done wrong here?

Thanks.
